Despite Gukesh Dommaraju's stumble, the event highlighted India's mixed fortunes and the rise of young talents like America's Abhimanyu Mishra. Divya Deshmukh's fearless performance in the Open section also underscored the growing strength of women in chess, inspiring future participation.

title: Barc making reactor for Navy’s next-gen N-subs
description: Bhabha Atomic Research Centre is developing a powerful 200 MWe reactor to significantly enhance the endurance of the Indian Navy's future submarines, including the S-5 class. This upgrade, more than doubling the power of existing reactors, is crucial for strengthening India's sea-based nuclear deterrent amidst China's growing naval capabilities.

title: Charlie Kirk’s assassination: Erika Kirk pulls Taylor Swift into controversy
description: Following Charlie Kirk's shocking assassination, his widow, Erika Kirk, has ignited controversy by involving Taylor Swift in memorial plans. Erika's ambition to outshine a Taylor Swift concert at Kirk's memorial event on September 21st has sparked outrage among Swift's fans.

description: Lauren Kyle McDavid, wife of Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid, is featured in ELLE Canada, showcasing her lakeside cottage. The interior designer, entrepreneur, and founder of Kyle & Co Design highlights a space that blends European elegance with modern simplicity, as her retreat reflects her love for entertaining. Along with thoughtful design details, she creates a warm, welcoming atmosphere.

title: Inoue vs Nakatani: Japan loses boxing night; Saudi Arabia grabs spotlight
description: Japanese boxing fans will miss a historic Tokyo Dome event as Ring V: Night of the Samurai moves to Riyadh’s Mohammed Abdo Arena on December 27. Headlined by Naoya Inoue and co-featured by Junto Nakatani, the shift frustrates local fans, though fighters earn record paydays, marking Saudi Arabia’s growing presence in global boxing.
